html: The principle of revelation taught here through the analogy of a baby's being fed on milk before taking solid foods was also taught by Paul (see 1 Corinthians 3:1-2; Heb. 5:11-14), by Peter (see 1 Pet. 2:2), and by the Prophet Joseph Smith (see D&C 19:21-22). One must learn basic principles before he is ready to understand the mysteries of God.
